title: Does anyone know what this font is and where Ican buy iy?
content:
I think this has been altered slightly, but would really like to find the original font - any ideas?

Thanks in advance!

| --- | --- |

author: susie jones77

comments.content: It seems to me a custom lettering by one of their founder and calligrapher [Bailey Amon:](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011010458/http:/www.shopantiquaria.com/about/)
